events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will proceed with initial evaluation.
The application has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on the mention of software development skills and experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process for this software engineer role.
The initial screening call was completed, where the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge of software engineering fundamentals.
The candidate responded positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm to proceed to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to further assess their engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
